short_summary: The Office of the Pay Equity Commissioner requires the development of an online submission process for the collection of pay equity annual statements.
description: The Office of the Pay Equity Commissioner, as part of the Canadian Human Rights Commission, requires the development of an online submission process for the collection of pay equity annual statements.

full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement**

## **Title**
SBIPS - Development of an Online Submission Process for Pay Equity Annual Statements

## **English Title**
Development of an Online Submission Process for the Collection of Pay Equity Annual Statements

## **Solicitation Number**
P2400337

## **Publication Date**
April 16, 2024

## **Tender Closing Date**
May 24, 2024, at 12:00 PM (EST)

## **Expected Contract Start Date**
June 1, 2024

## **Expected Contract End Date**
December 31, 2025

## **Tender Status**
Expired

## **Industry Classification**
*81111705 - Systems Architecture*

## **Classification Description**
* The development of a systems architecture to support the online submission of pay equity annual statements.

## **Procurement Method**
Competitive Selective Tendering

## **Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (RFP)

## **Competition Type**
Open Competition

## **Notice ID**
36158

## **Regions of Opportunity**
National Capital Region (NCR)

## **Contracting Entity**
Canadian Human Rights Commission
344 Slater Street, 8th Floor
Ottawa, ON K1A 1E1

## **Contact Information**
Julie Dicaire, bids.soumissions@chrc-ccdp.gc.ca
(343) 597-1736

## **Eligible Trade Agreements**
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## **Attachment**
[TOP-SECRET] 
[@ https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36158/npp---english.pdf ] TENDER DESCRIPTION
The Canadian Human Rights Commission seeks the development of a user-friendly online submission process for pay equity annual statements. The process must allow for the collection, validation, and storage of these statements while ensuring the confidentiality and integrity of the data.

To participate in this tender, interested parties must:

* Review the attached Tender Notice and supporting documents
* Confirm their eligibility under the applicable trade agreement(s)
* Submit a fully-completed proposal by the specified closing date and time via BidExpress
